entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests.SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue #82055
  • NamedMutex outerloop test failures #82052
  • [Pack] NU1102 errors occur when running command “dotnet pack --runtime win10-x64” #82051
  • [wasi] Native crash in `System.Collections.Tests` - `out of bounds memory access` #82043
    8.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices GroupPrincipal.GetMembers always returns null for EmailAddress of last element. #82035
  • JIT: Missing zero initialization for dependently promoted and returned 16-byte struct #82032
    8.0.0
  • JIT\opt\ThrowHelper\NonVoidThrowHelper failing with NativeAOT #82030
    8.0.0
  • VerifyInstalledTermInfosParse fails for (upcoming) Fedora 38 #82026
  • NativeAOT codegeneration question #82023
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #82021

Closed

  • [win-x86 gcstress] Consistency check failed: Crst Level violation: Can't take level 9 lock CrstCodeVersioning because you already holding level 5 lock CrstInteropData #82037
  • [API Proposal]: Add a BitArray.Contains method #72999
    Future
  • Improve ConfigurationBinder performance with existing collections #81183
    Future
  • Non-deterministic behavior of Type.IsAssignableTo #78619
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: Asynchronously cancel a CancellationTokenSource #23405
    8.0.0
  • Clarification about hdt_load_in_memory_assembly #77375
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize<T>() not work #82016
  • System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException : No hay más extremos disponibles desde el asignador de extremos. #82027
  • Blazor globalization inconsistency between WASM and Server #54486
    8.0.0
  • String concatenation - slight performance regression in .NET 7 (7.0.1) compared to .NET 6 #80348
  • Fix the filename size issue in ilasm #4777
    Future
  • `DateTime.Now` on Linux has wrong timezone #60469
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Temporarily disable TestCallingConventions test for x86 GCStress #82060
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move 'special characters' detection logic to JsonReaderHelpers.cs #82059
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Use the new BitArray.HasAllSet() method #82057
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Disable DictionaryExpansion.cmd test on win-x86 #82056
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Temporarily disable Interop/COM/ComWrappers/WeakReference/WeakReferenceTest #82054
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Revert "Fix pal tests build on osx-arm64" #82053
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    needs-author-action, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add assert messages to ConcurrentDictionary test failing on native aot #82047
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove some remnants of multi-module support #82046
    area-VM-coreclr
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Optimize zero inits out only for locals that aren't candidates to be tracked #82042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove a bunch of array allocations #82041
    area-Meta
  • System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82038
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • RegularExpressions.Tests: match MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion used by RegularExpressions.Generator when DotNetBuildFromSource. #82036
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable tests blocked on closed issue #50381 #82024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Slightly refactor handling of conditions/conditional branches in the backend #82020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix getting typecode of generic parameters restricted to be Enum #82029
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add new InteropData ordering rule #82044
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Create BitArray.HasAllSet() and .HasAnySet(). #81527
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix XmlSqlBinaryReader and introduce a corpus of SqlXml tests #81878
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • Allow some intrinsics in Tier0 #77357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - some cleanup to prepare for Wasi.Build.Tests, and wasi workload #81977
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: start working on profile consistency #81936
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add DOTNET_JitOnlyOptimizeRange #82034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix non-determinism in Type.IsAssignableTo #78939
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Try fixing runtime-extra-platforms runs #82022
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add CancellationTokenSource.CancelAsync #81444
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Replace some single-char strings with chars #81831
    area-Meta
  • SetThreadDpiAwareness for host error dialog #81930
    area-Host
  • [release/7.0] Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81804
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81805
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Fix multiple dumps from being generated #81064
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.15
  • Fix pal tests build on osx-arm64 #81604
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT repro instructions: simplify setting ILC response file #82018
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Move a number of JsonPropertyInfo reflection components to DefaultJsonTypeInfoResolver #81990
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Remove errno check from the fallback in getexepath #81852
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Bump iOS/tvOS minimum version to 11.0, cleanup some code #81965
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix scanning `newarr` #82028
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [coop][interp] Fix GC transitions for thunk invoke wrappers #81773
    area-Interop-mono
  • Console.Tests: extend VerifyInstalledTermInfosParse test. #82025
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • JIT: Relax reg-optionality validity checks #81614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> is now intrinsic. #81695
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add Linux NativeAOT debug info regression test #81612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Resources, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Resources, 6.0.x
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should preserve references to const string fields #81997
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert all usages of target_link_libraries to use PUBLIC/PRIVATE specifiers #81924
    area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasi: add workload packs, templates, and Wasi.Build.Tests #81849
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Allow root path for Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.SpecialDirectories #81861
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2112809 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add emsdk dependencies to fix codeflow to installer #81988
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Adding support to mono for v128 constants #81902
  • Intrinsify `CreateSpan` in static constructor interpreter #81747
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Refactor common variables used for the "send runtime tests to helix" steps into a shared template that all of our pipelines that run runtime tests can use. #81926
    area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Lazily initialize base state for Random-derived type #81627
  • Sprinkle some more readonly around #81297
    area-Meta
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] prevent use of null when processing alpn list #81797
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Generalize `emitRemoveLastInstruction()` #82002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove duplicated code and fix CI #81611
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [mono] Remove the support for non r4fp, its not used by any supported platforms. #82005
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • update alpine test images #81841
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Handle some "field offset computation" patterns #81998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build.cmd -s clr.aot+libs #82019
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet run fails: "The specified executable is not a valid application for this OS platform" #30565
  • .NET tool does not seem to find the SDK #30546
  • [NETSDKE2E][Intermittent]With NET8 preview 1 SDK installed, "Unhandled exception. System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a disposed object." happens when installing Android workload in CLI #30545

Closed

  • ClickOnce Publish fails if two referenced projects have the same file, despite being Excluded from the publish #29368
  • Missing dependency installing sdk 6.0 on Ubuntu 20.04 #30464

PullRequests

Created

  • Better fix for the OSX issues in installer repo #30573
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: add workaround for IFieldSymbol.Name that has angle brackets #30572
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #30571
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30570
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30569
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Port Fix dotnet new -v displaying exception callstack (#30292) #30557
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GenAPI] generate forwarded type assembly attributes. #30556
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix typo in AliasAssignmentCoordinator.cs #30553

Merged

  • Adding the linux feed removal to 6.0.1xx as I figured out the issue #30037
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30517
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: add readonly keyword for synthesized fields. #30539
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix dotnet new -v displaying exception callstack #30292
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump up dependencies and make them fit for Dependabot #30549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.8.0 to 19.9.2 in /eng/dependabot #30550
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump dependencies Verify.Xunit and Verify.DiffPlex to same versions as dotnet/templating #30548

Updated

  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2112911 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Issue 25536 enable -disable-build-servers for pack, clean, test, msbuild #30481
    Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Which commit corresponds to 4.4.0 (latest) on nuget? #66848
  • Stack overflow due to struct layout cycle #66844
  • `T` in pattern `obj is not T` or `obj is ... or T` relates to containing type's property `T` instead of type name `T` if `T` is declared as both a property and a type #66841
  • IncrementalValuesProvider returns wrong cached objects #66840

Closed

  • StackOverflowException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Workspaces.dll #5529
    Backlog
  • Incorrect NRT tooltip when doing null check #66854
  • EditorBrowsable is not working on Visual Studio 2022 #66843
  • OpenProjectAsync throws exception when opening a project. CSharpCompilerInputs returns duplicate argument (/ruleset) after compilation. #8408
    Backlog
  • Completion should not be displayed after switch expression #37315
    Backlog
  • Introduce using statement should offer a using declaration in C# 8.0 projects #33699
    Backlog
  • Document's SemanticModel.GetSymbolInfo always returns a null symbol #23913
    Compiler.Next
  • Feature request: null coalescing code fix for wider scenarios #28180
    Backlog
  • VS Visual Basic offers invalid simplification inside "nameof" expression for Keywords #34494
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Address PROTOTYPE comments for "Primary Constructors" #66865
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Push on Restore bug #66864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move the 'make method async' fixer down to shared layer #66863
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'make method synchronous' fixer down to shared layer #66862
    Area-IDE
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'doc comment' related code fixers down to shared layer #66860
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'convert to record' fixer down to shared layer #66859
    Area-IDE
  • Don't include star when committing promoted item #66858
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'remove new modifier' fixer down to shared layer #66857
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'remove in keyword' fixer down to shared layer #66856
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'conflict resolution' fixer down to shared layer #66855
    Area-IDE
  • move the 'make struct a ref struct' fixer down to shared layer #66853
    Area-IDE
  • move the 'remove async modifier' fixer down to shared layer #66852
    Area-IDE
  • move 'remove unused local function' down to shared layer #66851
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'replace default literal' fixer down to shared layer #66850
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'upgrade project' fixer down to the shared layer #66849
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'use explicit type for constants' down to anlayzer layer #66847
    Area-IDE
  • Remove expensive call to ApplyPolicy #66845
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Remove unnecessary null suppressions in calls to `RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode` #66842
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Move 'convert to async function' down to CodeStyle layer #66839
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 🔨 Enable MSBuild COMM log in bootstrap #66832
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Dev/toddgrun/request concurrency #66767
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix crash in FAR helpers when only part of a linked-document set has been updated #66805
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move the 'add parens in conditional' fixer down to the CodeStyle layer #66838
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add net6.0 TFM to ExternalAccess.Razor #66846
    Area-IDE, Next
  • EA extensibility point for F# to implement TaskList service ( TODO comments support) #66695
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move the 'assign out parameter' fixer down to the CodeStyle layer #66837
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add tests for some "Primary Constructors" IDE scenarios. #66774
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Parsing for role and extension type declarations #66728
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 'introducing using' to support using-declaration-statements as well as using-statements #66808
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'add anonymous type member' down to CodeStyle layer #66835
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix dot completion in cases where dots are parsed as a range operator #66822
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'Add Parameter' fixer down to CodeStyle layer. #66836
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix crash in VB type name simplification #66813
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'Use local function' down to CodeStyle layer. #66825
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide unique suggestions when generating member names #66824
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Introduce Parameter - Fix crash #66402
    Area-IDE
  • Fix parsing of 'file[]' and 'required[]' in old language versions #66769
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Update Logging Methods #66826
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SharedFx tests in Helix always run against windows bits #46620
    Infrastructure
  • [chromium] [INFO:CONSOLE(1)] "Uncaught SyntaxError: Unexpected token import", source: http://x.x.x.x_framework/blazor.webassembly.js (1) #46618
  • ObjectDisposedException when calling JS.InvokeAsync #46617
  • Unskip MsQuic-dependent Tests on Debian12 When Available #46616
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #46614
  • Disabling integrity check for "/_framework/dotnet.7.0.2.<random>.js" #46612
  • IWebHostBuilder.Build fails with System.InvalidOperationException: 'A public method named 'ConfigureAutomatedTesting' or 'Configure' could not be found in the 'Program' type.' #46611
  • SignalR - Outbound bytes size #46609
  • Restore ability to compress all files during dotnet publish for Blazor wasm applications #46603
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Minimal APIs result processing does not support IResult via polymorphism unless an endpoint filter is added #46599

Closed

  • Event handling with Blazor component inside Angular - not working #46604
  • Switch Debian11 Amd64 helix queue to Debian12 once msquic is available #46418
    Infrastructure
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute with UseStaticFiles results in wrong status code (200 OK) #40518
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, https, mvc #46587
  • Perf improvement: single_query #46602
  • ViewEngine.GetView always fail #46363
  • Perf regression: single_query #46470
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #46468
  • Perf regression: https, plaintext, plaintext #46450
  • Can we use a BlazorApp without having the "_framework/blazor.server.js" reference added? #46554
  • AWSSDK is in the published folder despite no AWS service is used #46610
  • [SignalR] Cannot use InvokeAsync While there is an stream ongoing in SignalR #46503
    8.0-preview2
  • Add Claims to a user during login while using Identity #46558

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Prevent NRE when body is not set #46613
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Update .npmrc approach and locked dependencies #46601
  • Framework.Tests: support running against Linux build artifacts. #46600
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Skip test until Debian12 supports msquic #46615
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Don't clobber non-default status codes in static files middleware #46578
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `81de03e` to `376a7f3` #46606
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2f2e72b` to `b73f27f` #46605
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Avoid stream ID and client result ID collisions #46570
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭
  • First pass at basic query string parameters. #46545
  • Bump up the MIN_PORT for ANCM out of process #46432
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Unify HTTP token parsing code #46580
  • Update to Helix 3.16 #46563
    area-infrastructure
  • Update CreateSlimBuilder to use Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder. #46579
    area-web-frameworks
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Prevent NRE when body is not set #46564
    area-runtime
  • Introduce 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46562
    area-blazor
  • [blazor] startup sequence unification #46532
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Community pop up doesn't work in OnAppearing() #13305
  • WebAuthenticator crashes on some devices #13302
  • Connectivity.ConnectionProfiles contains WiFi instead of Ethernet when Ethernet connection is available #13299
    Backlog
  • Error: System.Exception #13298
  • Template option '--applicationId' doesn't work in standard maui template #13297
  • [Windows] CollectionView crash when clicking arrows icon of CollectionView scrolling area #13295
    Backlog
  • Null reference for jsRuntime in .net MAUI app with BlazorWebView #13293
    Backlog
  • Black screen with Maui Blazor Hybrid in Net 7 #13291
  • publish failed with PublishSingleFile=true #13290
  • help the app dont want to run #13289

Closed

  • FlexLayout doesn't work with BindableLayout #10546
    Backlog
  • The views overlap and ScrollView Scroll does not work when FlexLayout is child #5091
    Backlog
  • FlexLayout inside StackLayout does not adjust height #11708
    Backlog
  • Geolocation - Listening for location changes in the foreground #3678
    Backlog
  • [MAUI-Windows] "Element not found. (0x80070490)" exception occurs when ScrollView is inside a FlexLayout #9905
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Layout Cycle Detected when a Flexlayout is inside a StackLayout on Windows #11909
    Backlog
  • Maui Slider Thumb Issue #13061
    .NET 8 Planning
  • DisplayPromptAsync auto-capitalizes some letters #13129
    Backlog
  • Installing android emulator #13235
  • Fix issues on net8 branch #11481
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [net8] Review changes related with AndroidEnableMarshalMethods on net branch #11605
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .NET MAUI Maps for iOS doesn't allow to zoom in and out #13288
  • O programa "[20588] MauiApp1.exe" foi fechado com o código 2147942405 (0x80070005). #13211
  • Maui FilePicker : On Android, the pick files are disabled. #13294
  • [ARM64] Fail to install 6.0 MAUI from latest public build with error "Workload installation failed: microsoft.android.sdk.darwin::32.0.482 is not found in NuGet feeds" #12242
  • Google maps not working - Unable to retrieve flag snapshot for com.google.android.libraries.consentverifier #8242
  • Failed to launch android application maui with the provided template project #8359
  • AppIcon does not deliver what it suggests #12087

PullRequests

Created

  • [controls] one less WeakReference in TypedBinding #13304
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Don't lose the padding when background is set #13301

Merged

  • When measuring FlexLayout unconstrained, allow child to be desired size #13216
    area/layout 🔲, layout-flex
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Windows] Correctly set the Slider ThumbImageSource #13194
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [housekeeping] Update dotnet-autoformat-pr.yml #13300
  • [housekeeping] Update dotnet-autoformat-pr.yml #13296
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13265
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [CI] Allow to pass the checkout dir to the packs template. #13264

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix sizing of button when using CharacterSpacing #13250
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Unit tests for FlexLayoutManager #6800
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Subscribes to the property chain upto the application for theme binding. #8957
    community ✨, area/theme
  • [Android] Fix crash when opening a `TabbedPage` from a `ContentPage` that is referenced in `Shell` #9213
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨
  • 1100-Enhancement-DatePicker-supports-nullable-(Selected)-Date #9727
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨, area/Maps🗺
  • Handle renamed or deleted MauiImage files #13251
    area/single project ☝️
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Fix Editor scrolling #13234
    area/controls 🎮
  • Set Icon to null and back again, working around Android issue #13267
    platform/android 🤖
  • [Windows] Fix Shell FlyoutBackground property #13132
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [controls] fix memory leak in Style and AttachedCollection #13260
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Resizetizer] Do not update images if they have not been updated. #13224
    area/single project ☝️
  • Update Essentials API Docs Misc #12996
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scaffold-DbContext generates DateTime instead of DateTimeOffset for PostgreSQL database #30274
  • EF7 generating incorrect SQL for the Concat/Union All, The same code was working fine for EF6.4.4 #30273
  • efcore not support Maui 'Add-Migration' ? #30268
  • EnitytFrameworkCore.InMemory v6.0.13: FromSqlRaw throws InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression' to type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.QueryRootExpression. #30267
  • Linq select cannot project an entity containing both Json columns and ICollections #30266
  • Test: Tpc_entity_owning_a_split_collection_on_middle takes forever to run #30265
  • Query/NullSemantics: full expansion not necessary for bool results in projection on sql server because we convert to CASE block anyway (search condition) #30264
  • Query: convert `NOT(match LIKE pattern)` to `match NOT LIKE pattern` #30263
  • Query: Null semantics doesn't convert LIKE to 2-value logic when optimized expansion is not allowed #30262

Closed

  • Forcing non-null type when scaffolding #30271
  • Allow query operations on the underlying type when a value converter is defined #30197
  • The path params of EF.Functions.JsonExtract cannot use variable. #30235

PullRequests

Created

  • Store null table name in the model snapshot for TPC abstract types #30275
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.31.2 to 3.32.0 #30272
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Store null table name in the model snapshot for TPC abstract types #30257

Updated

  • Support JSON columns in compiled models #30254
  • Fix to #30028 - Added nullable property to Json mapped model resulting in errors instead of mapping non existing json property to null #30101
  • Add NativeAOT support for Change Tracking #30256

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-13
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Remove obsolete source-build repoAPI #15526

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #15514
  • Update the coherency dependency to be the runtime and not the sdk for emsdk #15516
  • Turn on debugging output for VMR synchronization #15524

Updated

  • Cleanup known-good source-build projects #15527
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15513
